languages.text:
Ваш персонаж только что получил временный {g|Encyclopedia:PositiveEffect}положительный эффект{/g} от союзника! Такие {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}эффекты{/g} усиливают персонажей или помогают в бою иначе.
Нажмите {console_bind|LeftStickButton}, чтобы перейти в трекер инициативы, выберите нужного персонажа с помощью {console_bind|DPadVertical} и нажмите {console_bind|Func01}. В открывшемся окне информации о персонаже выделите эффект и нажмите {console_bind|RightStickButton}, чтобы подробнее узнать о его свойствах.

traits.locale_text:
Ваш персонаж только что получил временный положительный эффект от союзника! Такие эффекты усиливают персонажей или помогают в бою иначе.
Нажмите {console_bind|LeftStickButton}, чтобы перейти в трекер инициативы, выберите нужного персонажа с помощью {console_bind|DPadY} и нажмите {console_bind|Func01}. В открывшемся окне информации о персонаже выделите эффект и нажмите {console_bind|RightStickButton}, чтобы подробнее узнать о его свойствах.

languages.text:
Your character has received a temporary {g|Encyclopedia:PositiveEffect}positive effect{/g} from an ally! Such {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} enhance your character's capabilities in combat in some way.
Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} tracker, select the character using {console_bind|DPadVertical}, and press {console_bind|Func01}. In the character information window that opens, select the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} and press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to learn more about it.
languages.original_text:
Ваш персонаж только что получил временный {g|Encyclopedia:PositiveEffect}положительный эффект{/g} от союзника! Такие {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}эффекты{/g} усиливают персонажей или помогают в бою иначе.
Нажмите {console_bind|LeftStickButton}, чтобы перейти в трекер инициативы, выберите нужного персонажа с помощью {console_bind|DPadVertical} и нажмите {console_bind|Func01}. В открывшемся окне информации о персонаже выделите эффект и нажмите {console_bind|RightStickButton}, чтобы подробнее узнать о его свойствах.

traits.locale_text:
Your character has received a temporary positive effect from an ally! Such effects enhance your character's capabilities in combat in some way.
Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the initiative tracker, select the character using {console_bind|DPadY}, and press {console_bind|Func01}. In the character information window that opens, select the effect and press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to learn more about it.

Your character has received a temporary positive effect from an ally! Such effects enhance your character's capabilities in combat in some way.
Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the initiative tracker, select the character using {console_bind|DPadY}, and press {console_bind|Func01}. In the character information window that opens, select the effect and press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to learn more about it.

Your character has received a temporary {g|Encyclopedia:PositiveEffect}positive effect{/g} from an ally! Such {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} enhance your character's capabilities in combat in some way.
Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} tracker, select the character using {console_bind|DPadVertical}, and press {console_bind|Func01}. In the character information window that opens, select the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} and press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to learn more about it.

Your character has received a temporary {g|Encyclopedia:PositiveEffect}positive effect{/g} from an ally! Such {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} enhance your character's capabilities in combat in some way.
Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} tracker, select the character using {console_bind|DPadVertical}, and press {console_bind|Func01}. In the character information window that opens, select the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} and press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to learn more about it.

languages.text:
¡Tu personaje ha recibido un {g|Encyclopedia:PositiveEffect}efecto positivo{/g} de un aliado! Este tipo de {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efectos{/g} potencian de un modo u otro las cualidades de tu personaje.
Pulsa {console_bind|LeftStickButton} para activar el cuadro de {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}iniciativa{/g}, elige al personaje con {console_bind|DPadVertical} y pulsa {console_bind|Func01}. En la ventana de información de personaje que se abre, elige el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} y pulsa {console_bind|RightStickButton} para entrar en detalles.
languages.original_text:
Your character has received a temporary {g|Encyclopedia:PositiveEffect}positive effect{/g} from an ally! Such {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} enhance your character's capabilities in combat in some way.
Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} tracker, select the character using {console_bind|DPadVertical}, and press {console_bind|Func01}. In the character information window that opens, select the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} and press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to learn more about it.

traits.locale_text:
¡Tu personaje ha recibido un {g|Encyclopedia:PositiveEffect}efecto positivo{/g} de un aliado! Este tipo de efectos potencian de un modo u otro las cualidades de tu personaje.
Pulsa {console_bind|LeftStickButton} para activar el cuadro de iniciativa, elige al personaje con {console_bind|DPadY} y pulsa {console_bind|Func01}. En la ventana de información de personaje que se abre, elige el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} y pulsa {console_bind|RightStickButton} para entrar en detalles.

languages.text:
キャラクターが味方から一時的に{g|Encyclopedia:PositiveEffect}プラス効果{/g}を受けた！このような{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}は、戦闘におけるキャラクターの能力を何らかの形で強化する。
{console_bind|LeftStickButton}を押して{g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}イニシアチブ{/g}トラッカーを起動し、{console_bind|DPadVertical}でキャラクターを選択して、{console_bind|Func01}を押す。開いたキャラクター情報ウィンドウで{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}を選択し、{console_bind|RightStickButton}を押して詳細を確認しよう。
languages.original_text:
Your character has received a temporary {g|Encyclopedia:PositiveEffect}positive effect{/g} from an ally! Such {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} enhance your character's capabilities in combat in some way.
Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} tracker, select the character using {console_bind|DPadVertical}, and press {console_bind|Func01}. In the character information window that opens, select the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} and press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to learn more about it.

traits.locale_text:
キャラクターが味方から一時的に{g|Encyclopedia:PositiveEffect}プラス効果{/g}を受けた！このような効果は、戦闘におけるキャラクターの能力を何らかの形で強化する。
{console_bind|LeftStickButton}を押してイニシアチブトラッカーを起動し、{console_bind|DPadY}でキャラクターを選択して、{console_bind|Func01}を押す。開いたキャラクター情報ウィンドウで{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}を選択し、{console_bind|RightStickButton}を押して詳細を確認する。

languages.text:
您的角色从盟友那里获得了暂时性的{g|Encyclopedia:PositiveEffect}正面效果{/g}！此类{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}会在某些方面提高角色的战斗能力。
按下{console_bind|LeftStickButton}{g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}{/g}查看行动顺序，之后通过{console_bind|DPadVertical}来选择角色，之后按下{console_bind|Func01}。角色的信息窗口打开之后，您可以选择某个{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}，按下{console_bind|RightStickButton}来了解更多此效果的相关信息。
languages.original_text:
Your character has received a temporary {g|Encyclopedia:PositiveEffect}positive effect{/g} from an ally! Such {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} enhance your character's capabilities in combat in some way.
Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} tracker, select the character using {console_bind|DPadVertical}, and press {console_bind|Func01}. In the character information window that opens, select the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} and press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to learn more about it.

traits.locale_text:
您的角色从盟友那里获得了暂时性的{g|Encyclopedia:PositiveEffect}正面效果{/g}！此类效果会在某些方面提高角色的战斗能力。
按下{console_bind|LeftStickButton}查看行动顺序，之后通过{console_bind|DPadY}来选择角色，之后按下{console_bind|Func01}。角色的信息窗口打开之后，您可以选择某个{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}，按下{console_bind|RightStickButton}即可了解更多此效果的相关信息。

languages.text:
Dein Charakter hat einen temporären {g|Encyclopedia:PositiveEffect}positiven Effekt{/g} von einem Verbündeten erhalten! Solche {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effekte{/g} verbessern die Fähigkeiten deines Charakters im Kampf auf irgendeine Weise.
Drücke {console_bind|LeftStickButton}, um den {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}Initiative{/g}-Tracker zu aktivieren, wähle den Charakter mit {console_bind|DPadVertical} aus und drücke {console_bind|Func01}. Wähle in dem sich öffnenden Charakter-Informationsfenster den {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} und drücke {console_bind|RightStickButton}, um mehr darüber zu erfahren.
languages.original_text:
Your character has received a temporary {g|Encyclopedia:PositiveEffect}positive effect{/g} from an ally! Such {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} enhance your character's capabilities in combat in some way.
Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} tracker, select the character using {console_bind|DPadVertical}, and press {console_bind|Func01}. In the character information window that opens, select the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} and press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to learn more about it.

traits.locale_text:
Dein Charakter hat einen temporären {g|Encyclopedia:PositiveEffect}positiven Effekt{/g} von einem Verbündeten erhalten! Solche Effekte verbessern die Fähigkeiten deines Charakters im Kampf auf irgendeine Weise.
Drücke {console_bind|LeftStickButton}, um den Initiative-Tracker zu aktivieren, wähle den Charakter mit {console_bind|DPadY} aus und drücke {console_bind|Func01}. Wähle in dem sich öffnenden Charakter-Informationsfenster den {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} und drücke {console_bind|RightStickButton}, um mehr darüber zu erfahren.

languages.text:
Votre personnage a reçu un effet {g|Encyclopedia:PositiveEffect}positif temporaire{/g} de la part d'un allié ! Ces {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effets{/g} améliorent les capacités de votre personnage au combat.
Appuyez sur {console_bind|LeftStickButton} pour activer le traqueur d'{g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g}, sélectionnez le personnage à l'aide de {console_bind|DPadVertical}, et appuyez sur {console_bind|Func01}. Dans la fenêtre des informations de personnage qui s'affiche, sélectionnez l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} et appuyez sur {console_bind|RightStickButton} pour en savoir plus.
languages.original_text:
Your character has received a temporary {g|Encyclopedia:PositiveEffect}positive effect{/g} from an ally! Such {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} enhance your character's capabilities in combat in some way.
Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} tracker, select the character using {console_bind|DPadVertical}, and press {console_bind|Func01}. In the character information window that opens, select the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} and press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to learn more about it.

traits.locale_text:
Votre personnage a reçu un {g|Encyclopedia:PositiveEffect}effet positif temporaire{/g} de la part d'un allié ! Ces effets améliorent les capacités de votre personnage au combat.
Appuyez sur {console_bind|LeftStickButton} pour activer le traqueur d'initiative, sélectionnez le personnage à l’aide de {console_bind|DPadY}, et appuyez sur {console_bind|Func01}. Dans la fenêtre d'informations sur le personnage qui s'affiche, sélectionnez l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} et appuyez sur {console_bind|RightStickButton} pour en savoir plus.

languages.text:
Karakterin bir dost birimden geçici bir {g|Encyclopedia:PositiveEffect}olumlu etki{/g} aldı! Bu tarz {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}etkiler{/g} karakterinin çatışma kapasitesini bir şekilde artırır.
{g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}Öncelik{/g} izleyicisini etkinleştirmek için {console_bind|LeftStickButton} düğmesine bas, {console_bind|DPadVertical} ile karakteri seç ve {console_bind|Func01} düğmesine bas. Açılan karakter bilgi penceresinden {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}etkiyi{/g} seç ve {console_bind|RightStickButton} düğmesine basarak o etki hakkında daha fazla bilgi edin.
languages.original_text:
Your character has received a temporary {g|Encyclopedia:PositiveEffect}positive effect{/g} from an ally! Such {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} enhance your character's capabilities in combat in some way.
Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} tracker, select the character using {console_bind|DPadVertical}, and press {console_bind|Func01}. In the character information window that opens, select the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} and press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to learn more about it.
